title: Country Music Awards, Kanye, MTH, Derek Chauvin Trial and more.
itunes:title: Country Music Awards, Kanye, MTH, Derek Chauvin Trial and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Yesterday is gone so let's go make something happen today. The Chief Love Officer advises a CNA that senior citizens need love too. After a 20 day hiatus, Chrissy Teigen is back on Twitter. Fool #2 murders another one for all the 420 soldiers out there in the spirit of Christopher Cross. Uncle Steve puts out a very real scenario if the outcome of Derek Chauvin's murder trial does not go a certain way. Dwyane Wade is now part owner of the Utah Jazz. Who broke up with who first? Apparently, Kanye got a big ego! Big Dog explains to The Steve Harvey Nation how Fool #2 handles breakups. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the trial and upcoming verdict along with his expectations of it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
